alert.note: Alert for Inland Sussex; Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:09AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sussex, southeastern Kent and southeastern Caroline Counties through 345 AM EDT... At 309 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harrington, or 17 miles south of Dover, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dover, Milford, Harrington, Camden, Federalsburg, Bridgeville, Bowers, Woodside, Viola, Smithville, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Agner, Dover Base Housing, Andrewsville, Rising Sun, Big Stone Beach, Felton, Greenwood, Frederica and Houston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
